executiveSummary: Jamie Siminoff pitched Doorbot, the first smartphone-enabled video doorbell, to the Shark Tank investors seeking $700,000 for a 10% equity stake. Despite demonstrating strong sales and growth, all sharks ultimately declined to invest, with Kevin O'Leary offering a royalty-based deal that Jamie refused.
nextSteps: Jamie Siminoff will continue building and funding Doorbot independently, exploring alternative financing options such as venture debt or credit lines.
